sources.title: The Amityville Haunting | Full Movie | Horror Based On A True Story
sources.description:
The Amityville Haunting - In disregard of the shocking DeFeo murders, an unsuspecting family moves into the infamous house on 112 Ocean Avenue. Now, ghostly apparitions start to appear in their video surveillance system. Can they survive the Amityville haunting?
2011. Stars: Jason Williams, Amy Van Horne, Devin Clark
**Licensed from The Asylum.  All rights reserved**

metadata.Plot: This movie is a 'found-footage' film about the Benson family who move in to the infamous house where the DeFeo family were murdered in the 1970s over 30 years earlier. Things start happening to anyone who visits this house, and whoever lives there. This is the footage retrieved from the camera.
metadata.Actors: Jason Williams, Amy Van Horne, Devin Clark, Nadine Crocker
